mapper.select: SELECT u.id user_id, u.username, brand.name brand_name, p.product_name, thickness.name thickness_name, tech.name tech_name, p.product_name, IFNULL(SUM(o.amount),0) sale_amount, IFNULL(SUM(o.amount * o.stock_price),0) total_cost, IFNULL(SUM(o.amount * o.price),0) sale_price FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_product_out o ON u.id = o.create_user_id LEFT JOIN t_product p ON p.id = o.product_id left join t_brand brand on brand.id = p.brand_id left join t_tech tech on tech.id = p.tech_id left join t_thickness thickness on thickness.id = p.thickness_id GROUP BY u.username,p.product_name where u.user_id = #{userId}
